title: Grams to Ounces Converter (g → oz) | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Standard / Avoirdupois: oz = g ÷ 28.349523125 Troy ounce: troy oz = g ÷ 31.1034768 To go backwards: g = oz × 28.349523125 (standard) g = troy oz × 31.1034768 (troy)
